entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 10, 2024
entries.description: Ukrainian forces conducted a strike against Russian air defense assets in occupied Crimea overnight on June 9 to 10, likely with ATACMS. The Ukrainian General Staff reported on June 10 that Ukrainian forces struck a Russian S-400 air defense...

entries.title: Iran Update, June 10, 2024
entries.description: The Iranian Guardian Council approved a pool of six candidates that included mostly hardliners for the upcoming 2024 presidential election. The six approved candidates include five hardliners and one reformist on June 9 for the upcoming...

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 9, 2024
entries.description: The Biden Administration’s limited policy reversal permitting Ukraine to use US-provided weapons to strike Russian military targets within Russian territory has removed at maximum only 16 percent of Russia’s ground sanctuary – a small area along...

entries.title: Iran Update, June 9, 2024
entries.description: Israeli War Cabinet minister Benny Gantz resigned from the coalition government on June 9. Gantz’s resignation will not on its own cause the collapse of the Netanyahu government. The IDF expects to conclude clearing operations in Rafah in the “next...

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 8, 2024
entries.description: The Russian military command is reportedly transferring an unspecified number of forces to the Ukrainian-Russian border area near Kharkiv Oblast, but it is unclear if the Russian military command plans to immediately commit these redeployed forces...

entries.title: Iran Update, June 8, 2024
entries.description: Israeli forces rescued four Hamas-held hostages during a complex operation in the central Gaza Strip. Hamas captured the four hostages from the Nova music festival during the October 7 attack. This marks the second successful rescue of living...

entries.title: Iran Update, June 7, 2024
entries.description: Hamas leader in the Gaza Strip Yahya Sinwar indicated opposition to the latest Israeli ceasefire proposal, according to unspecified Arab officials.

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 7, 2024
entries.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin articulated a theory of victory in Ukraine on June 7 that assumes that Russian forces will be able to continue gradual creeping advances indefinitely, prevent Ukraine from conducting successful operationally...

entries.title: Africa File, June 7, 2024: Russian Diplomatic Blitz; Somalia Boots Ethiopia
entries.description: High-level Russian officials are meeting with Russian partners across Africa, seeking to advance the Kremlin’s strategic goals of projecting greater Russian influence to supplant the West and better positioning Russia for prolonged confrontation...

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 6, 2024
